name: Next Gen Fish AI
description:
Next Gen Fish AI What's the best way to celebrate the next gen consoles? Playing a game all about the next generation of fish AI of course!!

CONTROLS:

W / UP - Move forward

A&D / LEFT&Right  - Turn left & right

TIPS:

You need to be faster to scare bigger fish.

Use Your character to select upgrades.

The game saves after each upgrade, so if you're close to leveling up, don't quit until you get the next upgrade!

Downloading the game may give you better performance!

CREDITS:

Me :)
